article:
A modern system of plant taxonomy, the 'Reveal system' of plant classification
was drawn up by the botanist J.L. Reveal (1941- ), professor emeritus at the
Norton Brown Herbarium, Maryland (see his
[http://www.life.umd.edu/emeritus/reveal/pbio/WWW/cvjlr.html cv]).

The last update of the system was made in 1999. The author later joined the
Angiosperm Phylogeny Group and contributed to the APG II system.

It is available online in lecture notes (dated 1999) at the Norton Brown
Herbarium, Maryland (with an extensive listing of synonyms, both nomenclatural
and taxonomic, for each name in the system): [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve1.html 1], [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve2.html 2], [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve3.html 3] [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve4.html 4], [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve5.html 4], [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve6.html 6] [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve7.html 7], [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve8.html 8], [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve9.html 9] [http://www.biologie.uni-hamburg.de/b-
online/systems/reve10.html 10].

----

According to these lecture notes the main groups in the system are

* division [[Magnoliophyta]] [= angiosperms] *: class [[Magnoliopsida]] *::
  subclass [[Magnoliidae sensu Chase & Reveal|Magnoliidae]] *: class
  [[Piperopsida]] *:: subclass [[Piperidae]] *:: subclass [[Nymphaeidae]] *::
  subclass [[Nelumbonidae]] *: class [[Liliopsida]] [= monocots] *:: subclass
  [[Triurididae]] *:: subclass [[Aridae]] *:: subclass [[Liliidae]] *:: subclass
  [[Arecidae]] *:: subclass [[Commelinidae]] *:: subclass [[Zingiberidae]] *:
  class [[Ranunculopsida]] *:: subclass [[Ranunculidae]] *: class [[Rosopsida]]
  *:: subclass [[Caryophyllidae]] *:: subclass [[Hamamelididae]] *:: subclass
  [[Dilleniidae]] *:: subclass [[Rosidae]] *:: subclass [[Cornidae]] *::
  subclass [[Lamiidae]] *:: subclass [[Asteridae]]

----
